page.title: 04A TRELLECH PUPIL'S SATURDAY.
page.content: IT IS SATURDAY MORNING . I MAKE MY MUM AND DAD A CUP OF TEA IN BED. WE ALL GET UP. AFTER WE HAVE TIDIED UP WE WALK ABOUT TWO MILES TO THE BUS STOP,THE BUS GOES TO MONMOUTH. THERE WE DO SOME SHOPPING. WE GET A FEW THINGS. THEN WE GO TO THE THREE HORSE SHOES INN. WE HAVE A MEAL THERE. AFTERWARDS MUM AND STEVEN WHO IS MY BROTHER DO THE LAST MINUTE SHOPPING AND DAD AND I PHONE FOR THE TAXI. THEN WE ALL MEET AT KWIK-SAVE SUPERMARKET AND WE GO HOME.WHEN WE GET HOME I GET CHANGED INTO MY OLD CLOTHES AND GO ON MY BIKE,STEVEN PLAYS WITH HIS CARS,MUM COOKS TEA AND DAD READS HIS BOOK.
